mapper.select: SELECT pms_pk_plan.id, pms_pk_plan.name, pms_pk_plan.description, pms_pk_plan.punch_quantity, pms_pk_plan.total_bonus, pms_pk_plan.start_time, pms_pk_plan.end_time, pms_pk_plan.enrolled_quantity, pms_pk_plan.like_count, pms_pk_plan.is_anonymously_publish, pms_user_create_plan.punch_victory_count, pms_pk_pattern.description AS plan_pattern, pms_pk_plan_status.description AS plan_status FROM pms_pk_plan, pms_pk_pattern, pms_pk_plan_status, pms_user_create_plan WHERE pms_pk_plan.id IN ( SELECT pk_plan_id FROM pms_user_create_plan WHERE pms_user_create_plan.user_id = #{uid} ) AND pms_pk_plan.pk_pattern_id = pms_pk_pattern.id AND pms_pk_plan.plan_status_id = pms_pk_plan_status.id ORDER BY pms_pk_plan.id DESC

SELECT pms_pk_plan.name, pms_pk_plan.image_url, pms_pk_plan.description, pms_pk_plan.pk_quantity, pms_pk_plan.enrolled_quantity, pms_pk_plan.punch_cycle, pms_pk_plan.punch_quantity, pms_pk_plan.total_bonus, pms_pk_plan.pk_bonus, pms_pk_plan.start_time, pms_pk_plan.end_time, pms_user_create_plan.punch_count AS punch_count, pms_pk_plan_status.description AS plan_status, pms_pk_pattern.description AS plan_pattern FROM pms_pk_plan, pms_pk_pattern, pms_pk_plan_status, pms_user_create_plan WHERE pms_pk_plan.id = #{pid} AND pms_pk_plan.pk_pattern_id = pms_pk_pattern.id AND pms_pk_plan.plan_status_id = pms_pk_plan_status.id AND pms_user_create_plan.user_id= #{uid} AND pms_user_create_plan.pk_plan_id= #{pid} ORDER BY pms_pk_plan.id DESC
SELECT id, punch_count FROM pms_user_create_plan WHERE pms_user_create_plan.user_id= #{userId} AND pms_user_create_plan.pk_plan_id= #{planId}
